about.name: Liz Davies
about.title: Developer
about.about_me: Looking for my next great adventure. With degrees in computer science and music and experience as a full-stack developer, busker, opera singer, and educator, I am ready to leverage my creativity to dif deeper into the software development space and learn new technologies and perspectives.
